summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing leisure activities while on vacation in Bequia. Epstein offers the use of jet skis and boats, and Staley expresses gratitude for their friendship.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing leisure activities with Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, responding to Epstein and expressing thanks for their friendship.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley share a friendly relationship, as indicated by their communication and expressions of gratitude.

keyFacts: The email was sent by Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley on January 22, 2011.
Epstein offers the use of jet skis, snorkels, and boats to Staley.
Staley mentions being anchored in Christmas Cove and expresses enjoyment of being in Bequia.
Staley wishes Epstein safe travels to Paris.
The email contains a confidentiality disclaimer from JPMorgan Chase.
